name: Aleo123
description: Aleo123 is a block explorer and data analytics platform which provides a range of one-stop data service based on Aleo. It allows users to access and understand transaction data, stake Aleo, deploy programs etc.

name: Soter Wallet
description: A digital crypto wallet built for Aleo blockchain, which empowers the users with fast and secure crypto assets management services.

name: Aleo Name Service
description: ANS is a name registrar on the Aleo Network that transforms complex addresses into confidential, easily memorable names, simplifying and securing interactions.

name: AlphaSwap
description: AlphaSwap facilitates transparent and confidential token swaps of any tokens on the Aleo blockchain. Users can create or contribute to liquidity pools and earn fees from swaps.

name: Arcane Finance
description: Arcane Finance creates cutting-edge financial tools that seek to empower users to grow their assets. Their flagship platform is a fully private, non-custodial decentralized exchange on Aleo that leverages zero-knowledge to ensure privacy.

name: FoxWallet
description: FoxWallet is a decentralized self-custody wallet designed to simplify and secure digital asset management across web3 by integrating with major zero-knowledge blockchain networks like Aleo.

name: Leo Wallet
description: Leo Wallet gives users a choice between publicly vs. privately shared information, so they donâ€™t have to publicly broadcast transactions.

name: Obscura
description: Obscura is a platform providing direct RPC endpoints, APIs, and SDKs to streamline app development on Aleo and reduce the setup time for ZK dApps.

name: Pondo.xyz
description: Pondo Liquid Staking Protocol allows users to stake their Aleo Tokens to strengthen the network with easy integrations and low transaction fees.

name: Puzzle Wallet
description: Puzzle is a mobile and extension wallet with Aleo Account Abstraction to explore Aleo, play zkGames, and earn rewards.

name: ShadowFi
description: ShadowFi is a decentralized liquidity hub on Aleo, incentivizing providers and network members to boost protocol fluidity. It allows voters to control emission dynamics through democratic voting processes.

name: Staking.xyz
description: Staking.xyz is a staking portal where users can manage and monitor their staking positions, getting regular updates on the performance of their validators and detailed reporting.

name: Verulink Bridge
description: Verulink is an ETH, USDC, and USDT-native bridge between Ethereum and the Aleo Network.
